nodes.bodyText: Throwing an exception would fill the stack trace, so how about changing it to return null?
When is the schema pulled in this case?
the caller will pull by themselves.
It would be better to show which series is not found and just throw PathNotExistException.
I think this is urgent, or you can extract the lock method separately. Otherwise, an IllegalMonitorStateException will be thrown because the next step will try to unlock but it is not locked.
unlock will catch IllegalMonitorStateException, so that's ok.
Yes, I added that just as a temporary solution, but I still hope you consider to do some refactoring, maybe not in this PR, though, since generating exceptions is somehow burdensome.
ok，by the way, I use force-push just because some modifications are small, so I think it could be merged with the previous  commit. Anyway, I will avoid do it again.
It will be complicated, I will do it later

Adding the parameter after "quorum" is a bit confusing, maybe we can use:
"{}: Log[{}] {} is accepted by the quorum", member.getName(), log.getCurrLogIndex(), log
